entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending in the afternoon then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
